snippet.title: How To Help Someone in an Emergency
snippet.description:
You're already more prepared just by knowing what emergencies to look out for. It starts with assessing the situation, calling for help if you need it and working together to help those who need it. 

These concepts aren't limited to only car accidents or fires, but also for depression, mental health, mental illness... 

I hope that seeing this chart could help you with how to help someone who needs it. 

I make all my charts from scratch with open data sets. The data I got from this video about 911 calls can be found here: https://www.kaggle.com/mchirico/montcoalert/data
tags: how to help someone in an emergency
how to help someone having a panic attack
how to help those we love
what to do in an emergency
how to help someone in a car crash
